While ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‹Å“BarcelonaÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ begins as a lamentful string arrangement before racing away with itself; a spagetti western soundtrack with a Tarantino feel about it.
